## Tender Details
- The Canadian Space Agency intends to retain the services of a contractor qualified to practice and hold a Quebec permit to replace a gas water heater with an electric one at the John H. Chapman Centre.
- The Contractor must complete the work by February 28, 2025; electric water heaters must be ordered after contract award and work on the site cannot begin before April 1, 2024.
- A site visit will be held on December 6, 2023, at Canadian Space Agency, 6767 Route de l’Aeroport, Saint-Hubert, Qc, J3Y 8Y9, starting at 10:00 am (EST). Bidders are recommended to visit the site beforehand.
